name: @nivinjoseph/n-data
description: Data access library for Postgres based on Knex

scripts.clean-all: yarn clean-src && yarn clean-test && yarn clean-dist
scripts.setup-db-server: docker run --name test-postgres -p 5432:5432 -e POSTGRES_PASSWORD=p@ssw0rd -d postgres:12.2 && yarn setup-redis-server && sleep 5
scripts.setup-db: docker run -it --rm -e PGPASSWORD=p@ssw0rd postgres:12.2 psql -h 172.17.0.1 -U postgres -c 'create database testdb;'
scripts.setup-test-env: yarn ts-build && yarn setup-db-server && yarn setup-db
scripts.test: yarn setup-test-env && node --test --enable-source-maps ./test/**/*.test.js || true && yarn teardown-test-env
scripts.teardown-test-env: docker stop test-postgres && docker rm test-postgres && docker stop test-redis && docker rm test-redis
scripts.publish-package: yarn ts-build-dist && git add . && git commit -m 'preparing to publish new version' && npm version patch && git push && npm publish --access=public

author: NiviN
